    ‚Ä¢ Be smart with the hellhounds, don't get in front of them because they release very powerful waves, which can kill you in a combo.
    ‚Ä¢ Many monsters run on the red life here, to avoid this renew the exeta res frequently.
    ‚Ä¢ Avoid walking diagonally (especially with life in yellow) as you can be paralysed and die in a combo.

    ‚Ä¢ Prismatic Ring is a plus to protect against physical attacks.

name: The Extension Site
strategy:
‚Ä¢ One of the best alternative spots because it gives a lot of profit and experience. Recommended level is 500+ as the combos are very high (4 Floating Savants can kill you).

üõ°Ô∏è Equipments:
    ‚Ä¢ Use ice ‚ùÑÔ∏è or energy ‚ö°Ô∏è weapon. If you want to use only one, stick with energy. If you want to use both, kill the Furies with energy and change to ice to kill the rest.
    ‚Ä¢ Most of the damage taken here is fire üî•. Bring as many defensive equipment against fire as you can and, if needed, use fire imbuement in your weapon or shield.

‚öîÔ∏è Strategy:
    ‚Ä¢ You can make a simple loop and you don't need to cover all the cave.
    ‚Ä¢ You are able to hunt here even if someone else is already in the place.
    ‚Ä¢ Start luring 3 Floating Savant at a time, when you feel confident try 4 at a time. If any other monster come together (like Fury) do not lure more than 3 Floating Savants, to avoid taking unecessary risks.

‚ö†Ô∏è Take care:
    ‚Ä¢ Floating Savants summon 1 Lava Lurker Attendant and Fury removes your skills all the time.
    ‚Ä¢ If you get in a box with Savants and Furies they will drop your skills, let you weak and, if don't pay attention and stay without mana, you won't be able to use Utito to recover your skills and won't be able to hit strong to heal your life.
    ‚Ä¢ It's essential to heal yourself while you hit, because only using pots may not be enough in some situations.
    ‚Ä¢ Avoid staying in front of Hellhounds, mainly in hunts like this, where the combo is already high.
    ‚Ä¢ If there are too many monsters around you, go to the wall to receive fewer attacks.
    ‚Ä¢ If you want to be more overpower, finish the bestiary and put DODGE on Floating Savant. You will lose a bit in profit but get more xp.
    ‚Ä¢ Use Supreme Health Potions without thinking anytime you need to heal.

name: Oramond Factory Raids (Lower Glooth Factory South)
strategy:
One thing to remember is that the raids take place every hour after the servers have come up and it is random which one you will find active. Once the raid starts it only lasts for around 45 minutes.

üõ°Ô∏è You'll be taking mostly physical damage in this spawn. There are some other elemental damage types but they are all pretty negligible. You may want to wear a Sleep Shawl or Enchanted Pendulet for additional physical protection but their elemental resistances won't help.

‚öîÔ∏è You'll also want to be careful of the Minotaur Totem and the Glooth Powered Minotaur. The Minotaur Totem will heal all creatures within its range. Make sure not to get trapped by one or you may have trouble escaping. It is especially dangerous if 2 Minotaur Totems are within range of each other as they each can heal 500-1000 health per turn. The Glooth Powered Minotaurs have to be lured over special tiles called Glooth Extractors. Once you do this they will become a Depowered Minotaur which makes them much easier to kill.

name: Warzone 6
strategy:
‚Ä¢ You can start hunting here as early as level 300 but it will improve as you get a few more levels and as you reach level 350 to 400 it will make it a lot more comfortable to box here.

‚Ä¢ There is lots of room to run the creatures here so you can get them weakened before you begin your box.

‚Ä¢ You will have to be careful in the few areas where you find Humongous Fungus though as they can make you drunk and could cause you to get trapped if you aren't prepared.

‚Ä¢ Your profit can depend on the price of suspicious devices on your server.

‚Ä¢ The cost to access the spawn makes it not a great area if you only have time for a quick 1 hour hunt. Though the profit will still cover the cost of entrance this becomes a better spawn when you are able to hunt for a longer duration, or return multiple times in the same 8 hour period as you'll only have to pay the entrance fee the once.

name: Warzone 5
strategy:
‚Ä¢ You can hunt here as early as level 300 but 350+ is recommended to hunt more comfortably.

‚Ä¢ The damage isn't too high while running the creatures but if you get trapped or stop to box the damage can add up quickly, especially when you have many Tunnel Tyrants on you.

‚Ä¢ Most rooms are quite open which does make it easy to run the creatures and you could begin your box when they are at lower health. It is definitely possible to hunt this spawn with mana potions but I preferred Great Spirit Potions while full boxing as they could combo quite high.

‚Ä¢ The cost to access the spawn makes it not a great area if you only have time for a quick 1 hour hunt. Though the profit will still cover the cost of entrance this becomes a better spawn when you are able to hunt for a longer duration, or return multiple times in the same 8 hour period as you'll only have to pay the entrance fee the once.

‚Ä¢ Your profit can depend on the price of suspicious devices on your server.

‚Ä¢ You will not be kicked of the dungeon after 8 hours. This means you can enter the spawn 7 hours and 59 minutes after you first entered the portal and still do a full hunt. You can even logout within the spawn and come back more than 8 hours later and still be able to do your hunt without having to pay for access again unless you leave the spawn.

‚Ä¢ It's close to the depot, so loot all the gold you can and when the cap runs out, deposit the gold and go back to hunt.

‚Ä¢ Everything that is dropped on the spot you can sell in Rathleton, so take advantage of it and sell it all at once to return with maximum cap.

‚Ä¢ To come on this hunt, you need to have 500 Oramond points.

üõ°Ô∏è Equipments:
    ‚Ä¢ The attack element to be used in this hunt is ENERGY, but you can use PHYSICAL as well
    ‚Ä¢ If you need to protect yourself better, invest in items with earth protection, like TERRA HELMET, as earth is the most damage done after physical

‚öîÔ∏èÔ∏è Strategy:
    ‚Ä¢ The way back here is very simple, just go killing the monsters in the upper hallway and then in the lower hallway
    ‚Ä¢ Some monsters attack from a distance, so you have to always keep using EXETA AMP RES to bring them close and finish
    ‚Ä¢ Always leave LOST BERSERKER last as he is the toughest and the other creatures take your mana

    ‚Ä¢ He becomes invisible and attacks from a distance, so before using EXETA AMP RES throw an avalanche to cancel his invisibility.

If you have an obsidian knife you can skin dragons/DLs and improve your profit.

üèπ Use a Ornate Crossbow + Drillbolts, or Arbalest if you are level 75+. Just walk in circles luring 2 creatures and attacking from distance.

üî• Don't stay in front of the dragon lords, their wave is strong and can kill. If you feel the need, use a Magma Amulet to take less fire damage.

name: Factory Quarter
strategy:
Great profit but bad xp for paladins level 150+ at war golems üí∞.

‚öôÔ∏è You don't need to do any quests to hunt here, just 4 gear wheels to access this place.

üèπ Walk in circles, killing the War Golems with Crystalline Arrows.

name: Upper Spike
strategy:
Great hunt to rush experience on low level mages. For a better xp you won't be looting, only lure creatures and shoot GFBs üî•, but if you wish you can loot mummy's Flask of Embalming Fluid, imbuement item that gives a nice profit.

‚ùÑÔ∏è Focus demon skeletons with avalanches because they cause the most damage.

name: Drillworm Cave
strategy:
Good hunt for free account paladins level 80+. It gives decent experience and money.

üèπ The creatures are spread so you don't need a shield. You can use Crystalline Arrows with a bow.

‚ú® Attack from distance and use exori con to kill the monsters. Exori san is not good here because the Drillworms are resistent to holy.

üõ°Ô∏è For safety measures bring fire bomb or fire wall runes and throw in the ground in case of danger. Drillworms won't step in unless you attack them.

name: Formorgar Mines
strategy:
Good place for paladins level 120+ to get profit. The experience is low but the loot pays off.

üî• Once in the spawn, shoot a fire wall diagonally in the center of the main room. Then walk up and down killing the destroyers.

üö© Then go to the east side, west, south and north, clearing each spawn.

üêæ After level 130+ you can make Destroyer's task. Kill 650 for a 30k experience reward and a chance to kill the boss that is located in the same cave.

requirements.name: Mission "Formorgar Mines 1" done of The Ice Islands Quest

name: Hero Cave
strategy:
üíç Use a stealth ring to get to the grim reaper floor (-4).

üî• Throw the fire field runes in the stairs in the entrance of the floor.

Don't do it on RETRO PVP servers or you can get a RED/BLACK SKULL.

Use MIGHT RINGS and STONE SKIN AMULETS üíÄ when you are luring, but remember to remove them when fighting others creatures than Grim Reapers (like Dark Magicians and Apprentices).

üõ°Ô∏è Use utamo vita, kill the magicians that are around first, lure one Grim Reaper with caution and run to the stairs. Then walk up and down in the fire, shooting exori flams in the creature.

Always renew your fire fields after killing the reaper and your magic shield (utamo vita) before luring again.

name: Drillworm Cave
strategy:
Great hunt for free account knights for xp and profit. Recommended level 100+ with skills 80/80+.

‚öîÔ∏è Strategy
Focus on killing one Drillworm at a time. If there are more creatures use a firebomb üî• on the ground, go to the center and lure one creature at a time with ‚ùÑÔ∏è icicle rune.

Drillworms make a big damage and attack from distance, so be careful even inside the firebomb. If there are 3+ drills on the screen, go back until there are only 2, to be on the safe side.

‚ÜòÔ∏è Never stay in front of Drillworms as they cast powerful waves.

üíç Bring dwarven rings in case you run out of supplies or need to leave the hunt in a rush.

Also, bring 4x melee rings (axe/club/sword) to make more damage.

Use GFBs when there are more than 1 drillworm or when the giant spiders summons their hatchlings üï∑Ô∏è, to avoid breaking your defense.

name: Krailos Spider Lair
strategy:
Good respawn for knights level 100+ for experience and average for profit.

Make sure you always have full mana as Brimstone Bugs have mana drain and a box of them can drain all your mana.

üíØ Experience
You can make 150k~250k of experience per hour (up to 320k/h on green stamina).

üí∞ Loot
You probably won't have waste, neither get rich, making something between 0~20k/h.

üõ°Ô∏è Equipment
Regular set and if possible a Swamplair Armor to protect from earth attacks.

Bring weapon rings (axe/club/sword) and dwarven rings to avoid being drunk by Wailing Widows.

üêª Tasks
There are a lot of taskable monsters here.

- From level 50-79 you can task Wailing Widows, but you should try only the first floor, with caution, because the recommendation for this place is level 100+.
- From level 80-129 you can task Brimstone Bugs and Giant Spiders (both of them have bosses).

name: Drefia Wyrm Lair
strategy:
Great spawn for paladins level 70+. It gives a nice experience and loot.

üèπ You can use Power Bolts to save some money or Drill Bolts to have a nice boost in experience. At level 90+ use Crystalline Arrows to make more damage.

üêë Use 2x Mana Leech imbuements, so you can bring just 20 strong mana potions.

üêâ Try to lure at most 2 wyrms and kill them from distance.

name: Goroma Cults
strategy:
Great hunt for paladins level 75+ to get a wonderful profit and a good experience.

üí∞ The cultists drop rope belts that can be sold for up to 3.5k depending on the server.

üèπ Use crystalline arrows or prismatic bolts as ammunition.

‚ö°Ô∏è You can use thunderstorm runes to improve a little your experience but you will spend more.

‚ö†Ô∏è The teleport in the platform will bring you to Goroma Demons. If you can kill demons you can add this spawn to your hunting route, but your xp/h will decrease.

requirements.name: Mission "The Counterspell" done of The Shattered Isles Quest

name: Lion's Rock
strategy:
A great place to level up a knight before level 100. This hunt gives excellent experience üíØ and a decent profit.

The recommended level is 60+, however, it is possible to come even at level 35 if the character has good equipment and skills.

ü¶Å The monsters here are Ancient Scarab, Noble Lion and Roaring Lion. The most dangerous is the Ancient Scarab, which can make high combos.

Before entering Lion's Rock, you need make an very quickly access, which is part of Lion's Rock Quest (üìπ 1:47).

The beginning of the hunt is the hardest part, as more than 4 Ancient Scarab can come at once and, depending on your level, this can be dangerous. Move carefully, luring 3 creatures at a time, and lure more as you get more confident.

üí∞ The hunt is close to the depot and is good for lootbags, so if you want to increase your profit, take advantage of it.

‚öîÔ∏è Charms
If you want to improve your defense in this hunt, put DODGE rune in Ancient Scarab or Roaring Lion.

üõ°Ô∏è Equipments
If even with the charms it is still difficult, use EARTH protection items.

Recommended imbuements are 1 POWERFUL VAMPIRISM and 1 POWERFUL VOID or 2 INTRICATE.

requirements.name: Mission "Three Trials" done of the Lion's Rock Quest

name: Lion's Rock
strategy:
A great place to level up a knight before level 100. This hunt gives excellent experience üíØ and a decent profit.

The recommended level is 60+, however, it is possible to come even at level 35 if the character has good equipment and skills.

ü¶Å The monsters here are Ancient Scarab, Noble Lion and Roaring Lion. The most dangerous is the Ancient Scarab, which can make high combos.

Before entering Lion's Rock, you need make an very quickly access, which is part of Lion's Rock Quest (üìπ 1:47).

The beginning of the hunt is the hardest part, as more than 4 Ancient Scarab can come at once and, depending on your level, this can be dangerous. Move carefully, luring 3 creatures at a time, and lure more as you get more confident.

üí∞ The hunt is close to the depot and is good for lootbags, so if you want to increase your profit, take advantage of it.

‚öîÔ∏è Charms
If you want to improve your defense in this hunt, put DODGE rune in Ancient Scarab or Roaring Lion.

üõ°Ô∏è Equipments
If even with the charms it is still difficult, use EARTH protection items.

Recommended imbuements are 1 POWERFUL VAMPIRISM and 1 POWERFUL VOID or 2 INTRICATE.

requirements.name: Mission "Three Trials" done of the Lion's Rock Quest

name: Upper Spike
strategy:
Great hunt for low level mages to rush experience and get a nice profit.

üêÄ Start the hunt to the east, in the coryms spawn. Lure many creatures and kill them with avalanche.

üí∞ Then go to the north, in the mummies area and clear it. Loot all the Flasks of Embalming Fluid, an imbuement item that can be sold for a good price.

üêæ The number of creatures is high and you can finish many bestiaries in this hunt.

name: Krailos Spider Lair
strategy:
Great place for paladins level 90+ to make tasks and a good profit. The experience is not very good but the loot pays off.

üö© You don't need any special quest to access this place but it's recommended to do the first missions of Krailos to have access to the depot and be able to deposit and refill easier.

üõ°Ô∏è Use your regular set with 2x Mana Leech imbuements so you can bring just a few mana potions.

üî• A good way to start the hunt in the second floor is throwing a fire wall rune and killing while you walk up and down.

‚ö†Ô∏è Warning: throwing field runes on a RETRO PVP server can make you get a RED/BLACK skull.

üí∞ Making lootbag is highly recommended here as the creatures drop many valuable and heavy loots.

üêæ Between level 80-129 you can make Giant Spider's and Brimstone's tasks.

name: Rathleton Metal Gargoyles
strategy:
Good place for paladins level 80+ to get profit. The experience is not very good but the loot pays off.

üö© The spot is in the entrace of the city, so it's very easy to deposit, sell loot and refill.

‚ú® Lure the monsters, attack from distance and use exori san to kill them.

üèπ You can use Drill Bolts or Assassin Stars to be more protected.

üõ°Ô∏è Use a regular set or a death protection set. You can also use strange amulets to protect against energy.

name: Grimvale
strategy:
Good xp and great profit for paladins level 50+.

üî• Once you get down in the hole, throw a firebomb on your foot and a straight energy wall on the left (next to the firebomb).

‚ö° Lure one creature at a time, attack and walk in the fire bomb, making the creature take damage from the energy wall.

name: Krailos Steppe
strategy:
Good place for paladins level 70+ to get a nice profit and an average experience.

üõ°Ô∏è Creatures are strong against physical damage, so having good skills make a big difference here.

Lure 2~3 creatures and kill them from distance. Use exori san and exori con to kill faster.

name: Tiquanda West Water Elemental Cave
strategy:
Good place to rush experience on mages level 50+. The loot is not good but if you want to improve, bring a fishing rod and use on water elemental corpses, so you can loot precious stones.

üõ°Ô∏è The Water Elemental has little health and is easy to kill, but his attack is quite strong. Using a Helmet of the Deep you can protect yourself from strong attacks.

‚öîÔ∏è Lure one creature at a time, keep a distance and throw SDs. From level 60 onwards you can kill single targets with exori vis instead of SDs, and lure more than one creature (carefully) killing them with Thunderstorm Runes.

name: Ramoa
strategy:
Good hunting for low level paladins to get XP, for loot not so good.

‚öîÔ∏è Strategy
This hunt has a very satisfactory respawn, you can go around the island to clear all the respawn. Keep a good distance from monsters to avoid damage.

‚Ä¢ If you have many creatures lured on you use area spells, such as Exevo Mas San. To speed up the process of clearing the respawn, use Exori Con on monsters.

‚Ä¢ If you are between level 50-79 remember to start the Bonebeast task before going hunting.

üõ°Ô∏è Equipment
Use a Composite Bow and some Onyx Arrows.

üí∞ Loot
The loot on the focus floor of this hunt is not good, but with a higher level it is possible to go down floors and get loot with the respawn of Undead Cavebear (Boss Bonebeast), with him it is possible to get the mount.

requirements.name: Mission "Access to Ramoa" done of The Shattered Isles Quest

name: Lion's Rock
strategy:
Good hunt for premium account knights in terms of experience and loot. You can hunt here from at least level 70 and skills 80/80+.

üíØ Experience
You are able to make 130k to 160k per hour of experience (up to 240k/h on green stamina).

üí∞ Loot
The loot here is amazing, you will get many gems, profiting 5k to 15k per hour.

üó∫Ô∏è Rotation
Basically you will do a big loop through the floor. Heal with exura ico and kill the monsters with exori (when there's a group of them around) and exori hur.

requirements.name: Mission "Three Trials" done of the Lion's Rock Quest

name: Mother of Scarabs Lair
strategy:
Easy spawn for paladins level 60+ to get a good profit and an average experience.

üêõ The first floor of Ancient Scarabs is enough for level 60. When you feel it is getting easy you can try the lower floor.

üèπ Use Power Bolts or Drill Bolts if you can. Put a Mana Leech imbuement in your weapon so you can bring less potions and more bolts.

üõ°Ô∏è For equipment you can use a Fur Armor (earth protection) or, if you can afford, a Paladin Armor.

üíñ Heal yourself with exura infir + utura.

name: Cemetery Quarter
strategy:
Easy place for paladins level 60+. The experience and loot are average and the spawn is close to the depot (easy deposit/refill).

üèπ Use Onyx Arrows (or Drill Bolts if you have enough level) and kill the creatures from distance.

üîÆ It's a nice spot to farm charm points and you don't need imbuements. To unlock the bestiary for Zombies, Necromancers and Nightstalkers you have to kill 1000 of each to receive 25 charm points (75 in total).

üí∞ It's possible to make a loot bag to improve the profit but you will get less xp.

name: Edron Vampire Crypt
strategy:
This hunt is a good alternative to level up and get imbuement loot.

‚öîÔ∏è Strategy
In this hunt it is important to keep the focus on killing monsters and using Obsidian Knife on Bonebeast and Blessed Wooden Stake on Vampires. Be careful with the Necromancer as he will summon many monsters and always keep a good distance from monsters to avoid damage.

Use the spells:
‚Ä¢ "exura infir" to heal and remove the paralyze.
‚Ä¢ "utura" to progressively heal for 60s.
‚Ä¢ "exori san" to attack bonebeasts when there is more than 1 monster.

üõ°Ô∏è Equipments
For this hunt it is very important that you choose Enchanted Spears or, if you are level 55+, power bolts. The Enchanted Spear is very important to kill the Necromancer for its attack range.

üèÉ To make kiting easier on this hunt it is interesting to have a boots of haste to gain movement speed.

üí∞ Loot
To ensure a good loot it is interesting to collect Vampire Dust (Blessed Wooden Stake) and Hardened Bones (Obsidian Knife). Also collect the Vampire Teeth (Imbuement). With luck it is possible to drop good items and sell them.

name: Carlin Forbidden Temple
strategy:
‚Ä¢ Great place to rush experience on mages level 130+. However, be prepared to have a complete waste.

üî• Lure 3 Grim Reapers at a time and kill them with Great Fireball Runes. Use UTAMO VITA all the time.

üõ°Ô∏è Equipments
    ‚Ä¢ Use death/physical protection set.

requirements.name: Mission "Zathroth Remnants" done of Cults of Tibia Quest

name: Carlin Forbidden Temple
strategy:
Great place for knights level 80+ to get experience. Usually it's waste but if you get lucky you can profit.

‚öîÔ∏è Strategy

Right at the entrance, there will be many creatures, so don't despair. Basically you will do a loop counterclockwise.

Bring firebombs üî• to control the number of creatures that will attack you. If you are not used to this place, start with 3 creatures.

requirements.name: Mission "Zathroth Remnants" done of Cults of Tibia Quest

name: Exotic Cave
strategy:
üí∞ Great place for low level knights, easy to refill, very near to city. It's good to profit also to exp, but the cave usually is very crowded.

‚Ä¢ If you are around level 100 test the box of creatures, lure 5 monsters first, then gradually increase until you get used to the place. But don't worry, the creatures are pretty weak.

üî• Until level 200 you won't have good elemental weapons, but after that (or if you are coming to do bestiary) you may use fire weapons, they are 110% effective against the creatures.

‚öóÔ∏è Imbuements
    ‚Ä¢ Use 1 powerful vampirism and 1 powerful void. There is no need to use more imbuements, only if you want üí∏.

‚ö°Ô∏è Charms
    ‚Ä¢ There is no need for charms because the creatures here are very weak. If you still want, put DODGE on bats and GUT on spiders.

üõ°Ô∏è Equipments
    ‚Ä¢ Terra protection set. Low levels may bring Silver Amulets if needed.

requirements.name: Mission "Zathroth Remnants" done of Cults of Tibia Quest

name: Exotic Cave
strategy:
Get physical protection set because Exotic Cave Spiders can hit pretty hard.

üï∑Ô∏è Avoid getting boxes with more than 3-4 Exotic Cave spiders, because they can oneshot you.

‚Ä¢ Try to run around, shoot GFB's üî• and use your UE.
‚Ä¢ Loot every Terra Item, mushrooms, platinum coins and spider silks üï∏Ô∏è.

requirements.name: Mission "Zathroth Remnants" done of Cults of Tibia Quest

name: Exotic Cave
strategy:
The best way to hunt here is luring 5-8 creatures and using the diamond arrow rotation (diamond arrow > exevo mas san> diamond arrow > great fireball rune > repeat).

üíñ Always heal with exura gran san and try to keep your mana full at all times (if you get out of mana you will probably die).

‚öóÔ∏è The recommended supply is for a level 150.  If you have a higher level you may require less supply.

üõ°Ô∏è Use a physical protection set (Zaoan Helmet, Prismatic Armor and Legs, Guardian Boots, and Enchanted Werewolf Amulet).

üï∏Ô∏è Avoid getting more than 4 exotic cave spiders at once if you are level 150. You can bring a might or prismatic ring to swap in if you see that you are going to lure more than 4 spiders (keep in mind that every time you unequip and equip a ring of blue plasma you will need to use a bullseye potion again).

‚ö†Ô∏è IMPORTANT: you will need at least 2 vampirism and 2 void imbuements.

üí°Tips:

‚Ä¢ You can sell used ring of blue plasmas to Fadil on Darashia. So keep an eye on the timer of the ring. When it reaches 1 minute, unequip it and equip a new one.

‚Ä¢ The first floor has a bigger spawn and is overall a better place to hunt than the second floor.

‚Ä¢ The second floor has some spiderwebs blocking the path and you will need a physical damage weapon to break it.

requirements.name: Mission "Zathroth Remnants" done of Cults of Tibia Quest

name: Old Fortress
strategy:
Good place for mages level 150+ to get experience. The loot will pay the waste in the long run, but don't expect much profit.

üõ°Ô∏è Use a full defensive set to protect against physical damage.

üíØ The key to maximize your experience here is:

    Always be moving
    Avoid getting trapped
    Know when and where to UE
    Don't stop for a single monster

üêæ You can start Necromancer's task before coming here. Even not having much necros it will help you to advance in the task and get your Soul Stone.

name: The Hive
strategy:
‚Ä¢ Use an ice weapon ‚ùÑÔ∏è, all creatures here are weak or neutral to ice.

‚Ä¢ There's not much of a secret, just lure the creatures and kill them.

‚ö†Ô∏è The hunt has several floors, the higher it is, the greater the amount of creatures, so be careful.

name: The Hive
strategy:
Good experience hunt for knights level 50+ with good skills (80/80+). The loot isn't good and the loss can be up to -8k/h.

üêù Creatures
This guide covers only the surface of the The Hive. Here you will find:
‚Ä¢ Swarmers. Really fast but don't do a lot of damage.
‚Ä¢ Insectoid Workers. Don't damage a lot but are harder to kill than Swarmers.
‚Ä¢ Crawlers. Really fast and about as strong as a Giant Spider.
‚Ä¢ Waspoids. Similar to the other creatures and have a bad poisoning.
‚Ä¢ Hive Pore. Invincible unless you have the proper quest. You can shut it down for a few minutes but you can't kill it. This creature spawns lesser swarmers, which are swarmers with less hp and attack. The problem is that they block the path all the time and break your defense, making you get much more damage.

Most of the time it's not worth using antidote as you will get poisoned anyway, except when it's from Waspoids as their poison really hurts.

üíØ Experience
A knight level 80 can reach up to 100k/h here, 150k/h on green stamina. Higher levels (100~) with good skills can tank and kill the mobs faster and make more than that.

üí∞ Loot
Bad loot. Most of the times the loot and creature products don't cover up the costs. You shouldn't hunt here if you are afraid of wasting.

üíÇ NPCs
The most important NPCs in the area are NPC A Rock in a Hard Place, which sells supplies and buys creature products which you loot while hunting here; and NPC Oracle, who gives you quests which you can complete while hunting here, for some easy extra experience and hive points that can be traded for rewards like outfits.

name: Edron Lycantrophes Cave
strategy:
The cave has many big rooms linked by smaller corridors. You will always have space to run around and kite the monsters in the big rooms, but be aware that some of the enemies summon weaker creatures than can potentially trap you.

‚Ä¢ If you are between level 80 to 130, you can lure fewer monsters through the corridors when you feel overwhelmed.

‚Ä¢ As your level increase, you can keep going further in the cave and even add a few rooms on the -2.

name: Minotaurs Cult Cave
strategy:
One of the greatest places in Tibia for knights to profit, often crowded. You can come here as early as level 150 and make tons of money ü§ë.

‚Ä¢ If you are level 150~250 go slow and be careful not to lure more than 3 monsters, to avoid using many health potions or getting killed ‚ò†Ô∏è in a combo. As you feel more confident start luring more.

‚ö†Ô∏è Warning with Zealots and Prophets together, the damage of their combo is very high.

name: Fury Dungeon
strategy:
Good place for paladins level 230+ to get an average xp and loot.

üî• There are many fire fields in the floor, so bring a Firewalker Boots and you'll spend much less supplies.

üèπ Lure a group of monsters and kill them with avalanches + exevo mas san + exori con.

requirements.name: Mini World Change "Fury Gates" must be active

name: Yielothax Dimension
strategy:
Great spawn for knights from level 90 to 130 for experience and profit. The recommended skills are 85/75+.

‚öîÔ∏è Strategy

Try to lure no more than 3 Yielothax and avoid being in front of all of them at the same time, because their wave deal a high damage and can send you back to temple.

Do a big loop counterclockwise, luring and killing the mobs around you with area attack spells (exori, exori min, exori gran).

üíØ Experience

You can make between 500k/h and 800k/h, and up to 1.2kk/h on green stamina.

üí∞ Loot

You can make 50~150k of profit per hour depending on your skill, level and imbuiments.

The main loot here is Might Ring, that drops a lot and can be sold for 5k.

üõ°Ô∏è Equipment

Yielothax's abilities are melee and poison, so it's recommended to use a physical damage protection set.

‚öóÔ∏è Imbuiments

    Basic Critical in weapon
    Basic Mana Leech in weapon and helmet
    Intricate Life Leech in armor and weapon

ü¶Ñ Boss

If you have killed 250 Yielothax and your server has killed 2000 in total, you will be able to kill the Raging Mage boss. He appears after killing the Energized Raging Mage in the tower to access Yielothax Dimension.

Raging Mage very rarely drops Elemental Spikes which can be sold for 30kk~120kk.

requirements.name: World Change "The Mage's Tower" must be active
Mission "Messengers of Peace" done of The New Frontier Quest

name: Factory Quarter
strategy:
‚öôÔ∏è You need 4 Gear Wheels to enter the War Golem area.

‚öóÔ∏è Imbuements are highly recommended to increase efficiency and profit.

‚öîÔ∏è Equipment:
‚Ä¢ War Golems are weak to physical and energy damage.
‚Ä¢ Best weapon is Gnome Sword (Level 250+), dealing energy damage.
‚Ä¢ If you are lower level, use your best physical weapon.

üõ°Ô∏è Protection:
‚Ä¢ Use a set with physical protection.

name: Alchemist Quarter
strategy:
Inside the quarter, go up the mountain and down to the center area.

Good respawn for premium account knights who want to rush experience and don't care for waste. You can start here at level 100 with minimum skills 85/85+.

The spawn is small and can only accomodate one player. If there is another person hunting here, don't waste your time because both experience and loot will be bad.

It's a better spawn for knights than the Cemitery Quarter because each floor is small and when Nightmares run you can reach them without luring more monsters.

‚öîÔ∏è Strategy
It's a dangerous place for this range of level. Don't be fooled into thinking that the location is easy due to the low number of monsters. Two nightmares can do a lot of damage and send you back to the temple if you don't watch out.

Go down the floors shown in the video and use the map to your advantage (dodging from monsters by going to the edges).

‚ö†Ô∏è Be careful not to go down floors which you don't know yet because you may find destroyers, plaguesmiths and even a demon ‚ö†Ô∏è 

If you have to use health potions, use mercilessly.

üíØ Experience
One can make 300k to 400k of experience per hour (up to 600k/h on green stamina).

üí∏ Loot
Altought there is a chance to drop valuable items (like BOH), it's rare and usually you'll have waste.

üêª Task
Nightmares are taskable between levels 80-129. You must kill 400 nightmares or nightmare scions and after that you can kill the boss (pretty far though, on Svargrond mines).

The task can (and should) be repeated if you are willing to waste some gold.

name: Alchemist Quarter
strategy:
The experience and loot here is average, but it's a good alternative if you need somewhere new to hunt. You can come here as early as level 50 (skills 70/70+). If you hunt conservatively you can make some good profit.

üíØ Experience
From 150k to 300k of experience per hour, and up to 450k/h on green stamina. The Nightmare floors will make you gain a lot of xp but lose on profit.

üí∞ Loot
Profit ranges from 0 to 15k/h, depending on your hunt style.

The mutated Tigers are pretty much guaranteed profit which will make up for the bog Raiders if you don't get anything. They drop tons of Life Rings, Glorious Axes and even rarely Angelic Axes and Guardian Shields.

Bog Raiders don't drop much but they can rarely drop a paladin armor which should turn any hunt profitable.

üõ°Ô∏è Equipment
Nothing special from what you usually wear but you can choose to wear a Garlic Necklace for the Bog Raiders lifedrain attack if you wish. Silver amulet is not recommended since they'll break quickly from being poisoned.

üé° Rotation
If you are level 100+, basically do a big loop, pulling monsters into groups to exori (rather than killing one by one), then go down to the laboratory buildings (üìπ 01:09).

Otherwise, do the big loop, ignore the buildings (unless you have to wait the respawn) and focus on hunting one by one AND the mutated tiger üêØ to the north (üìπ 02:48).

üêª Tasks
    Between level 50 and 79, you can task the Mutated Tigers which spawn is great
    Between level 80 and 129 you can task the Nightmares and Nightmare Scions
    Above level 130 you can task the Destroyers but there's only three of them in a room, so it's not very good

name: Medusa Cave
strategy:
Good hunt for mages level 130+. It gives a good xp, usually no waste and, depending on your luck, up to 40k of profit/h.

Once in the spawn you will go to each "leg" of the cave, killing one creature at a time with SDs üíÄ. To prevent luring many creatures you can close the path with a fire wall üî• and the creatures won't cross it (unless you attack them).

üëï Equipment

Use a TERRA SET for earth protection and GARLIC NECKLACES to prevent Life Drain.

If you can, use 2x Mana Leech imbuements. This will allow you to bring much more SDs and just a few mana potions (30 UMP is enough).

requirements.name: Mission "Zathroth Remnants" done of Cults of Tibia Quest

name: Cyclopolis
strategy:
Good place for mages level 180+ to make Behemoth bestiary and task. The xp is low and the loot is good.

üíç Use a stealth ring or utana vid to reach the spawn and stay invisible there to prevent minor creatures (like Cyclops Smith) to attack you.

Lure 3~5 behemoths and attack them with Avalanche rune ‚ùÑÔ∏è.

The rotation is up to you since it's a big respawn and doesn't matter much the directions you take.

üõ°Ô∏è Bring a full defensive set to maximize your protection against the behemoths.

name: Feyrist Meadows
strategy:
Okay hunt for XP, but amazing profit üí∞.

Very quick trip from Feyrist. You may want to use the walls to prevent too many creatures from attacking at once when you first come here. Otherwise, it's a pretty straightforward hunt, just run loops on either level pulling creaturers as you go.

üõ°Ô∏è A garlic necklace can help with the Weakened Frazzlemaw's significant life drain.

üåü Once you complete a mission from Maelyrra in Feyrist (kill 200 Enfeebled Silencers and Weakened Frazzlemaws) you have access to kill the boss in -2 of the cave, Kroazur, every two hours. This boss should be pretty easy if you can handle the hunt here, and occassionaly drops decent loot.

requirements.name: Mission "Troubled Animals" done of Threatened Dreams Quest

name: Krailos Ruins
strategy:
Great hunt for knights level 80+ to rush experience. Easy to access, high xp, but the profit is not good. You can improve your profit if you complete Krailos Quest to be able to buy/sell potions in Krailos, so you can refill faster and pick gold coins.

‚öîÔ∏è Lure 3 monsters at a time and rotate attack spells (exori - exori mas - exori). Get more monsters as you feel more confident. If you feel that it's too easy, you can go down to the -2 floor.

‚Ä¢ From level 90+ abuse of exori min.
‚Ä¢ Do not use utito tempo before level 100.

name: Ghastly Dragon Lair
strategy:
Great place for paladins level 140+ to make profit üí∞. The experience/h is not the focus here, but you can get decent XP.

‚ö°Ô∏è Strategy

Throw an Energy Wall (Use rune) on the ground and walk up and down (kiting) while you attack the Ghastly Dragon with Crystalline Arrows. They are weak to physical damage.

‚Ä¢ Use exura gran san to heal frequently, as they can hit hard.
‚Ä¢ Lure one dragon at a time. Two can be dangerous.

This is also an excellent task for the Paw and Fur Society.

requirements.name: Mission "Mortal Combat" done of The New Frontier Quest

name: Goroma Demons
strategy:
The best place to do the Demon task (6666 demons) üî•. You will have a great profit here üí∞, up to 150k+ per hour. The xp is bad for this level range.

üî™ Don't forget the Obsidian Knife/Blessed Wooden Stake to skin the demons and improve your profit.

Start luring 3 demons at a time and shoot Avalanche Runes in them. Lure more as you feel more confident.

üëï Equipment

‚Ä¢ All levels: Garlic Necklaces to protect against Demon's Life Drain beam. Magma Boots or Soft Boots (BoH won't help much).

‚Ä¢ Level 200~230: Magma Set (fire protection) and a Mastermind Shield (physical).

‚Ä¢ Level 230~300: Magical Set (Yalahari Mask, Royal Scale Robe, Magma Legs, Spellbook).

‚Ä¢ Level 300+: Yalahari Mask, Royal Scale Robe, Spellbook, Depth Ocrea, Bronze Amulet, and Soft Boots.

requirements.name: Mission "The Counterspell" done of The Shattered Isles Quest

name: Old Fortress
strategy:
Great place for knights level 140+, mainly for experience but also for loot if you are lucky.

üõ°Ô∏è Equipment
Bring weapon rings (axe/club/sword) or, if you prefer regeneration, soft boots + ring of healing.

‚öîÔ∏è Strategy
Lure creatures and kill them with area spells (exori, exori min, exori gran, etc).

On floor -2, rotate clockwise, enter in each room and clear it.

If the spawn is taken or you are in a team, you can go to floor -3. Just rotate clockwise on the outside rooms.

üí∞ Loot
The profit will depend on your lucky (0~20k/h), but the creatures here drop crown set parts, knight legs, warrior helmets and more valuable items.

Looting two-handed swords, hammers and halberds is good to have some extra profit.

name: Oramond Marshes (Minos)
strategy:
The best place to do the Demon task (6666 demons) üî•. You will have a great profit here üí∞, up to 150k+ per hour. The xp is bad for this level range.

üî™ Don't forget the Obsidian Knife/Blessed Wooden Stake to skin the demons and improve your profit.

Start luring 3 demons at a time and shoot Avalanche Runes in them. Lure more as you feel more confident.

üëï Equipment

‚Ä¢ All levels: Garlic Necklaces to protect against Demon's Life Drain beam. Magma Boots or Soft Boots (BoH won't help much).

‚Ä¢ Level 200~230: Magma Set (fire protection) and a Mastermind Shield (physical).

‚Ä¢ Level 230~300: Magical Set (Yalahari Mask, Royal Scale Robe, Magma Legs, Spellbook).

‚Ä¢ Level 300+: Yalahari Mask, Royal Scale Robe, Spellbook, Depth Ocrea, Bronze Amulet, and Soft Boots.

name: Mother of Scarabs Lair
strategy:
The best place to do the Demon task (6666 demons) üî•. You will have a great profit here üí∞, up to 150k+ per hour. The xp is bad for this level range.

üî™ Don't forget the Obsidian Knife/Blessed Wooden Stake to skin the demons and improve your profit.

Start luring 3 demons at a time and shoot Avalanche Runes in them. Lure more as you feel more confident.

üëï Equipment

‚Ä¢ All levels: Garlic Necklaces to protect against Demon's Life Drain beam. Magma Boots or Soft Boots (BoH won't help much).

‚Ä¢ Level 200~230: Magma Set (fire protection) and a Mastermind Shield (physical).

‚Ä¢ Level 230~300: Magical Set (Yalahari Mask, Royal Scale Robe, Magma Legs, Spellbook).

‚Ä¢ Level 300+: Yalahari Mask, Royal Scale Robe, Spellbook, Depth Ocrea, Bronze Amulet, and Soft Boots.

name: Demona
strategy:
Good place for free account mages level 140+ to make a nice profit and a average experience üí∞.

üèÅ It's a very far spot, it takes about 10 minutes to get there on a level 200+ with strong haste. If you are hunted or play in a hardcore PVP world it's a good hunting option because the enemies will have a hard time to find you as not everyone knows how to get here.

‚≠êÔ∏è Once in the spawn, walk clockwise and kill Warlocks/Infernalists with SDs. If the creatures get invisible, use the Stone Shower Rune to make them appear.

‚ò†Ô∏è Bring a Death Wand and a full magic set, no shield needed.

name: Caverna Exanima
strategy:
Great place for knights level 140+, mainly for experience but also for loot if you are lucky.

üõ°Ô∏è Equipment
Bring weapon rings (axe/club/sword) or, if you prefer regeneration, soft boots + ring of healing.

‚öîÔ∏è Strategy
Lure creatures and kill them with area spells (exori, exori min, exori gran, etc).

On floor -2, rotate clockwise, enter in each room and clear it.

If the spawn is taken or you are in a team, you can go to floor -3. Just rotate clockwise on the outside rooms.

üí∞ Loot
The profit will depend on your lucky (0~20k/h), but the creatures here drop crown set parts, knight legs, warrior helmets and more valuable items.

Looting two-handed swords, hammers and halberds is good to have some extra profit.

name: Sea Serpent North Area
strategy:
Great place for premium account knights for both experience and loot. Sea Serpents are weak to physical damage, which makes this spot highly recommended.

The place has many levitate spots, so you can bring parcels or trophy stands to save time and mana when you walk between the floors.

Killing the Young Sea Serpents between Sea Serpents spawns will make you do the best experience possible. Since they run away very fast on low life, cast exori/exori mas until they are deep yellow, then exori gran to make sure they won't run.

üíØ Experience
In average you can make from 250k/h to 400k/h (up to 600k/h in green stamina).

üí∞ Loot
The profit here is good and ranges between 5k and 25k per hour.

üõ°Ô∏è Equipments
Wear your usual equipment but if you have ice/earth equips you should use it. It's worth using a melee ring (axe/club/sword).

Although you need a Helmet of the Deep to enter the dungeon, you can change to your regular helmet once you've entered. You'll take a little damage from drowning but it's worth if you have a good helmet like Zaoan.

üêª Task
If you are level 130+ you can make Sea Serpent task, to kill 900 Sea Serpents or Young Sea Serpents. After you do that, you are able to fight the boss Leviathan.

requirements.name: Must have completed The Hunt for the Sea Serpent Quest

name: Edron Vampire Crypt
strategy:
Hunt for mages level 90+, good experience without waste.

üõ°Ô∏è On level 110- you should always be with UTAMO VITA activated.
Level 110+ can hunt without magic shield, using exura gran constantly.

üî• Lure the creatures and shoot GFBs. Remember to use Blessed Wooden Stake to skin the vampires and improve your profit.

üëï The recommended equipment is protection against Death and Lightning. Imbuements can be Mana Leech and Critical Hit.

name: Fire Dragon Dojo
strategy:
Awesome hunting spot for paladins level 100+. Good experience, great profit and a fun place to hunt.

üèπ You can use Assassin Stars or Crystalline Arrows. Lure 1~2 Lizard Chosen and attack from distance. Use exori con (if you have high skills) or exori san to kill faster.

‚ö°Ô∏è To play safer you can bring some energy wall runes and run in circles while you attack. Lizard Chosen doesn't step in the energy field (warning, if you do it on RETRO servers you can get a RED/BLACK skull).

üî• In higher levels using GFBs and exevo mas san might increase your experience.

üêæ Between level 80-129 you can make High Class Lizard's task. Kill 800 lizards for 30k experience reward.

name: Grimvale
strategy:
Good place for paladins level 120+ to get nice xp and profit.

üî• When you arrive to the floor -3 use a fire wall rune in the entrance and lure the creatures there while you attack from distance (warning: doing it on RETRO PVP servers can get you a RED/BLACK skull).

üõ°Ô∏è Use your regular set and 2x Basic Mana Leech imbuements, so you can bring less mana potions.

üèÉ The monsters in this cave are fast so stay hasted all the time.

üêæ Between level 80-129 you can make Werewolf's task. Kill 300 werewolves for 30k experience reward.

name: Horestis Tomb
strategy:
Here's a place worth hunting for if you're not just focused on XP. It's usually empty.

‚Ä¢ From level 30 it is possible to hunt on the first two floors.
‚Ä¢ Floor -2, depending on World Change, may have Tomb Servants that drop Fist on a Stick (to tame DROMEDARY) and can be worth more than 300k.
‚Ä¢ From level 40, you can hunt on floor -3 and have the chance to drop REINS from DARK APPRENTICE (to tame the BLACK SHEEP), which can be worth more than 1kk.
‚Ä¢ From level 50 you can hunt on floor -4 and have a chance to drop Mini Mummy from ELDER MUMMY.
‚Ä¢ From level 70+ you can try the last floors (-5 and -6). Be more careful here.
‚Ä¢ From level 120+ you can kill Horestis.

üõ°Ô∏è Imbuements
It's not a heavy hunt, so 1 powerful mana and weapon life should be enough. If not, add 2 imbuements of each.

üåè World Change
The number and types of monsters vary according to The Mummys Curse World Change.

When the spawn is weak, it's because the vases scattered on each floor have already been broken, that happens after the server save. And when the spawn is strong, the vases will be there until they break.

ü¶Ñ Boss
Horestis is a pharaoh who lives in the depths of this tomb, in order to face him we need to break each of the vases that are scattered on all floors of the tomb.

To break the vase just go with the character to it and click on the vase. If it doesn't break, after 1h you can try again. If it breaks, you gain access to face the boss once, and you can try to break another vase.

If you manage to break more than one, you can face him more than once too, as well as TASKs that accumulate points to face bosses.

name: Vandura Wyrm Cave
strategy:
Good hunt for xp for mages level 65+. The waste is up to -30k/h.

Lure one Wyrm at a time and kill with SDs.

name: Muggy Plains

requirements.name: Mission "Messengers of Peace" done of The New Frontier Quest

name: Alchemist Quarter
strategy:
Excellent hunt for profit and XP.

üõ°Ô∏è Equipment
Use a Bow and Onyx Arrows.

‚öîÔ∏è Strategy
This hunt is quite dangerous if you lure a lot of monsters, so be careful when entering. Keep some firebombs with you to place near some traps to avoid crowding monsters (strategy demonstrated in the video at 4:20). Route the two floors to better take advantage of monster respawns.

üí∞ Loot
In this hunt you will have loot with Sabretooth (imbuement) and some items to sell and get a good profit. You can choose to gather life ring and sell them or use them for better sustain in the hunt.

name: Venore Dragon Lair
strategy:
Good place for experience and money for knights level 35 to 60. Recommended skills is 65/65+. It's less contested than Darashia Dragon Lair, so it can be a good alternative spot. Very close to Venore, what makes it easy to resupply and make lootbags.

üõ°Ô∏è Equipments
A Knight Set or Crown Set is all you gonna need. But it is very important to carry an Obsidian Knife. Using it to skin dragons for leathers will add a nice profit to your hunts.

Killing dragons doesn't require imbuements, but if you are willing to, mana and crit are good options.

üíØ Experience
It's possible to make between 100k to 130k of experience per hour and up to 200k/h on green stamina.

üí∞ Profit
Usually there will be no profit nor waste here.

‚öîÔ∏è Strategy
To increase the hunt time and have less waste use spells only when there are more than 2 dragons. When there is only one, just do melee attacks.

However, if you want to push the experience just keep using exori ico and exori hur every time it is available, but you should save the exori for when there's 2 or more dragons.

name: Alchemist Quarter
strategy:
It's a balanced hunt for knights of at least level 20 with skills 70/70+ and promotion.

üíØ Experience
It's possible to get up to 160k of experience per hour with bonus xp, but this will depend on the hunting form.

In this guide the hunt is done in a safer way, focused on spending as little as possible, blocking at most two creatures at the same time, so as not to take damage from a third creature, and maximize profit.

If you are willing to lose some profit, you can kill more than two creatures at a time, and your exp will increase.

As you level up, test the upper floors (+1, +2). They can be a good way to increase your experience rate.

üí∞ Loot
The only loot that matters is mutated humans'. You should loot the gold, mutated flash (which worths 50 gps each, is stackable and light) and peanuts ü•ú, which can cost 2k to 3k in the market. Be careful not to eat the peanuts, which are one of the main sources of profit in this hunt.

Bring food because creatures here don't drop any (except for peanuts, that you don't want to eat). üçÑ

üó∫Ô∏è Rotation
The hunting rotation starts right at the entrance stairway.

name: Forbidden Temple
strategy:
Good hunt for paladins level 40+ for experience and loot. Recommended skills is 75+.

üõ°Ô∏è Equipment
Use a bow (Composite or Elvish) and some Onyx Arrows to help you in the hunt. It's good to bring some runes like Energy Wall and Thunderstorm. An important item for this hunt is the Garlic Necklace, because it decreases the life drain caused by Cultists.

‚öîÔ∏è Strategy
In this respawn, the floors get harder as you go down. Start doing the floor -2 and as you explore and get to know the place you can keep going down. Be careful when going down the stairs, not to get traped and unable to come back up. If you feel the respawn is weak, hunt on multiple floors to garantee the best experience gain.

In the last floor there may be the Boss of Cultists. It may be dangerous because it summons 2 fire elementals, but it is a desirable loot.

üí∞ Loot
You will drop Rope Belt (imbuement) and many other items to sell, like Skull Staff, Amber Staff, Blue Robe and more.

name: Darashia Dragon Lair
strategy: Lure one dragon at a time and kill it with wand + exori frigo.

name: Plains of Havoc Surface
strategy:
Excellent place to make over 500 bestiary points in free account area.

üíÄ Use Sudden Death Rune on Giant Spiders and Avalanche in case you accumulate Hunters, Wyverns, Demon Skeletons, Orc Berserkers, Orc Leaders and other weaker creatures.

üõ°Ô∏è The Stealth Ring and Fire Bomb Rune are optional to protect when you accumulate too many creatures.

name: Tiquanda Laboratory
strategy: Good place to make Carniphila's task and be able do defeat the boss Deathbine that drops the Carrot on a Stick ü•ï.

name: Krimhorn Barbarian Camp
strategy:
A balanced place for knights of at least level 20 (28+ recommended, to use exori ico). Both experience and loot are fair for this range of level.

If you don't mind spending a bit more, bring some stealth rings and use them when there's a lot of creatures (4+). Remember to remove them when the danger goes away. You can intercalate it with your weapon ring (axe/sword/club ring).

üí∞ Loot
The profit is small due to the high price of stealth rings but you won't have loss. If you don't use stealths, you can make 3~4k/h.

You can make much more if you do bagloots (there is a üì´ mailbox, Postman Quest required), but that will hit hard in your xp.

üíØ Experience
Usually 80k~110k per hour, but it can be up to 180k/h with green stamina and low level xp bonuses.

‚öîÔ∏è Skills
Don't need high skills. 60/60+ is enough to start.

name: Corym Black Market
strategy:
It's a small spawn for lower level knights, not very popular.

This spawn definitely isn't for PG since it's not that big but it's somewhere new to hunt if you're bored of the usual areas and want to experience somewhere new.

You can make up to 160k xp/h on green stamina (tested with 92 sword fighting). Recommended at least level 35 to use exori.

üí∞ Loot
In order to profit here you're going to have to pick up all the gold and creature products that drop. Consider bringing a larger backpack or a Zaoan Chess Box, it will make looting easier.

If you have lower skills or is finding it hard to make money here you can try cutting out some exoris and focus more on hunting one by one.

üõ°Ô∏è Equipment
The equipment you'll want to bring here is just your usual equipment, the more armor the better.

If you're a low-level funded by your main, wear some soft boots benefit you a lot at this level, with a small mana pool, and free up a lot of cap from the potions you save.

Bring around 150 mana potions (save some cap for looting gold and the items that coryms drop) and 20~ strong health potions for emergencies.

üó∫Ô∏è Route
The route starts out going down the staircase and then heads into each individual room.

Once you clear all the floors, then head back to the top and work your way down again.

Rather than killing the monsters one by one, you should run right into the middle of the room and exori a big group. Then finish the ranged monsters and the other monsters that run in low health.

üêó Task
You can take the Minotaur task before coming here if you want to get a few kills toward, but as you really only get like 20 kills per hunt, it's not the end of the world if you don't start the task.

name: Tiquanda Tarantula Caves
strategy:
üï∑Ô∏è Great spawn, not so known as the other tarantula spawns and the tarantulas are more spread out. To hunt here, you need at least level 14 for the flame strike spell.

You can come here with a brand new character and get magic levels very fast, since you'll be spamming spells.

This strategy is wasteful but you can make a level 30 using this respawn just three to four hours, and about 50k gold which you can use in the next spawn.

‚öîÔ∏è Equipments
Basic plate set with a spirit cloak, a Dragon shield and a platinum amulet is enough. If you don't care about spending money, you can bring some stealth rings because tarantulas can't see invisible.

Bring a good amount of brown mushrooms since the creatures here don't drop any food. üçÑ

Upgrade your wand or rod as soon as possible. At level 22 you can get a Wand of Draconia üî• (sorcerer) or a Northwind Rod ‚ùÑÔ∏è (druid). At level 18 get fire waving (sorcerer) or ice wave (druid).

üêª Task
Remember to take the task from Grizzly Adams before hunting here so you can kill the boss after 300 kills. 

‚ö†Ô∏è Careful
There are giant spiders in lower floors of this cave. Be careful because you can be an easy target for them.

name: Forest Fury Camp
strategy:
It's a very good hunt for profiting on low level, free acount knights. The experience per hour is average.

You can come here from level 25+, altought it's recommended level 35+ to have a nice profit. It's because the forest furies are slow to kill if you don't do a good damage. The longer you take to kill'em, more stealth rings will be used and less profit will be made.

üí∞ Loot
Normally 15~50k of profit per hour, which is really good at a low level. It will vary depending on how fast you kill the creatures and how many stealth rings you spend.

From level 60+ you don't need stealth rings and you will profit much more.

üíØ Experience
From 65k to 90k per hour and up to 150k/h with green stamina. Not the best place for xp but the focus here is profit.

üìà Strategy
Activate your stealth ring, go up the first floor and walk in circle killing the creatures. There will be towers in each corner. Go up each tower, clean it, then go back to the main floor and continue until the next tower.

If you have low level/skills, focus on killing only the Forest Furies. They are a bit weak to fire (5%+), so a fire weapon üî• will help you here.

name: Nargor
strategy:
It's a good place to profit for low level knights, but not so much for experience.

‚öîÔ∏è Strategy
Even though pirates are weak individually, the amount of monsters make it harder. Try to not get hit by more than 3 at the same time, use the objects on the map to dodge. When there are 3 or more around you, use exori.

Focus on Pirate Corsairs because they are the strongest of them.

Bring food because creatures here don't drop üçÑ.

üêª Task
Nargor is the place with the most pirates in Tibia, so it's a good opportunity to do the pirate's task.

name: Ashta'daramai
strategy:
Loot and experience here are average to bad, but it can be an alternative if the good dungeons are taken.

The dungeon becomes harder each floor. Clean the floors and keep going up as far as you feel safe.

If you are struggling with cleaning floors, ignore the towers and stay only in the basement.

ü™ô Bring a few dwarven rings because djinns make you drunk all the time and it will slow your hunt.

name: Tiquanda Corym Cave
strategy:
üõ°Ô∏è Equipment
Use Royal/Enchanted spears and any basic set.

‚öîÔ∏è Strategy
Lure the monsters and walk to the other entrances of this respawn. The big caves of Tiquanda Corym have a good respawn to stay long, even if someone else is also in the place.

To maximize your experience gain, use spells to clear the respawn faster, but remember that using spells will make your hunt more expensive.

In case of danger you can use a Stealth Ring üíç to be only attacked by Corym Vanguard.

name: Darashia Dragon Lair
strategy:
Good hunt for low level paladins to get experience. You can come as early as level 40 but it is recommended level 50+ with at least skills 60+.

üõ°Ô∏è Equipment
You can choose between:
‚Ä¢ Bow + Onyx Arrows: easier hunting and less cost with pots
‚Ä¢ Royal Spears: best value for money

‚öîÔ∏è Strategy
The best way to hunt in this place is luring one dragon at a time, so you don't get many waves around you. Keep a safe distance while you attack and avoid staying in front of them.

name: Forgotten Tomb
strategy:
Good hunt to get levels on mages from level 15 to 40 with low death risk and spending little.

‚öîÔ∏è Strategy
Use wand/rod and exori flam to kill the creatures. If you get paralysed use exura to heal.

name: Venore Corym Cave
strategy:
Good alternative for making experience on paladins level 30+.

üèπ Lure one Corym at a time, keep a distance and attack. If there's more than one creature, use your stealth ring.

‚ö†Ô∏è Be careful with **Corym Vanguard**, because it can see invisibility.
pathToNew:
1. From Venore, exit the city through the south gate.
2. Go south and then east towards the swamp.
3. Find the hole to the Corym Cave.

name: Orc Fortress
strategy:
Good hunt to do a moderate amount of experience and a profit that can vary between 50k and 70k (or even more, depending on the level); this profit is due to Broken Shamanic Staff (4-6k), which is dropped by the Orc Shaman and is used to make Imbuements.

You can get 10 to 15 staffs in one hour, depending on your luck and level.

üí∞ This hunt was done spending as little as possible, that's why, with the exception of Enchanted Spear, only ammunition that is sold in the free area was used, thus enabling even Free Account players to equip themselves to hunt in that location.
pathToNew:
1. From Venore, exit the city towards the north-west.
2. Follow the path to the east until you reach the fortress gate.
3. Enter the main gate and be careful with the guards.

name: Mistrock
strategy:
A good place for low level knights, with skills at least 50/50. ‚öîÔ∏è

‚Ä¢ Bring stealth rings üíç so the cyclops can't see you, making the risk of death (for creatures) minimal. Be careful that the invisibility doesn't end in the middle of the respawn, as the 3 cycs combo can kill you at a low level.

‚Ä¢ With the rest of your cap, take mana potions and use attack spells (from level 16 'exori ico') if you want to train your ml and speed up your hunt.

üí∏ Profit:

‚Ä¢ There will be no profit, as stealth rings are expensive. Usually the loss will be up to 9k/h, but if luck is on your side you can drop halberds and cyclop trophies and come out with less loss.

üíØ Experience:

‚Ä¢ Experience is good, especially if your skill is higher (70/70+). The place is full of cyclops, and it's possible to make even 100k/h with bonus xp.

name: Mount Sternum
strategy:
Good hunt to rush levels on low level mages, not for loot.

‚Ä¢ Try to always be attacking a cyclops, with wand/rod. Use *exori tera* if you are premium.

‚Ä¢ Heal with exura/exura infir and bring some health potions for emergencies ‚ù§Ô∏è.

‚Ä¢ üíç Bring a Stealth Ring and use it in case of danger, because cyclopses can't see invisible.

name: Banuta
strategy:
Good experience and profit for knights level 20+.

‚Ä¢ üíç Bring some stealth rings and use when you get to the cave ends, so Kongras won't attack you.

‚Ä¢ üêí Focus on Merlkins first, they do the most damage.

‚Ä¢ ‚öîÔ∏è If you use 1 *exori ico* per creature, your xp/h will improve a lot.

name: Magician Quarter (Blue Djinns)
strategy:
Great place to make money, very bad xp/h.

The costs to hunt here are very low, you just need a few pots and you can multiply your money (this really sounds like a pyramid scheme).

‚öîÔ∏è **Strategy**
‚Ä¢ There is a gate of expertise for level 60 to enter here. It's recommended level 60+ with decent skills (75/75+), to kill the djinns fast and profit more.

‚Ä¢ It's an easy hunt and you won't have much trouble. Basically clear the floors with melee attacks and use exori/exori gran in the last floor only.

üõ°Ô∏è **Equipments**
‚Ä¢ Bring a few dwarven rings because djinns make you drunk üç∫ all the time and that will slow your hunt.

‚Ä¢ If you have a soft boots, definitely bring it, to spend less pots and maximize your profit.

üêª **Task**
‚Ä¢ If you have finished The Djinn War Quest (Efreet Faction) you can do the blue djinn task, which is GREAT. Each task you finish gives you 5k, what adds a nice profit to your hunt.

name: Magician Quarter (Green Djinns)
strategy:
Great place to make money, very bad xp/h.

The costs to hunt here are very low, you just need a few pots and you can multiply your money.

‚öîÔ∏è **Strategy**
‚Ä¢ There is a gate of expertise for level 60 to enter here. It's recommended level 60+ with decent skills (75/75+), to kill the djinns fast and profit more.

‚Ä¢ It's an easy hunt and you won't have much trouble. Basically clear the floors with melee attacks and use exori mas and exori to clear crowded floors.

‚Ä¢ Focus on the Efreet, because it deals more damage and summons other djinns.

üõ°Ô∏è **Equipments**
‚Ä¢ Bring a few dwarven rings because djinns make you drunk üç∫ all the time and that will slow your hunt.

‚Ä¢ If you have a soft boots, definitely bring it, to spend less pots and maximize your profit.

üêª **Task**
‚Ä¢ If you have finished The Djinn War Quest (Marid Faction) you can do the green djinn task, which is GREAT. Each task you finish gives you 5k, what adds a nice profit to your hunt.

name: Orc Fortress
strategy:
It's a great place for knights to profit. It's bad to get experience and it's not the intent of the hunt.

üí∞ **Loot**
‚Ä¢ The goal here is to loot as many broken shamanic staffs as possible from orc shamans. It's worth approximately 4k and you can drop up to 60+ per hour (240k).

‚öîÔ∏è **Strategy**
‚Ä¢ Ignore all creatures except orc shamans. Use stealth rings to avoid most creatures and run from those who see invisibility (orc warrior, leader and more).

name: Orc Fortress
strategy:
Good free account hunt for low level knights. You can come here as early as level 45, with skills 60/60+.

üí∞ **Loot**
‚Ä¢ The orcs drop many heavy items (halberds, two handed swords) and you can make a bagloot if you want.

üó∫Ô∏è **Rotation**
‚Ä¢ Start at the surface, outside of the fortress, and advance as you feel safe. After entering the fortress, go down the ladder and head to the left, on the edge, to avoid getting surrounded by creatures.

‚Ä¢ Focus on the Orc Berserker, which is the creature that will deal the most damage and has little health.

‚Ä¢ Inside the fortress there is no secret, just walk in circles. This guide doesn't cover underground floor.

üõ°Ô∏è **Equipments**
‚Ä¢ Knight Set or better to protect yourself from physical damage.

name: Mistrock
strategy:
Good hunt for low level paladins. It's a 3-floor mountain, full of cyclops, so there is no big problem if someone else is hunting there too.

‚Ä¢ The best way to experience here is clearing each floor and going up.

‚Ä¢ Lure the creatures while you are walking to the next floor. Try to be always attacking a creature.

‚Ä¢ üíç In case of danger, use a stealth ring so the cyclops can't see you. Stealth rings are 10 minutes long.

name: Venore Amazon Camp
strategy:
Excellent hunt for any vocation to make good money at low level.

‚Ä¢ If you are between level 10 and level 15, it's better to hunt on the surface and in the tower where there are few Amazons and Valkyries.

‚Ä¢ If you are level 16 or more, it's interesting to hunt underground, facing the Witches, Ghouls and Mummy, so the exp/h improves and you will continue to farm the main item of this hunt for profit: Protective Charm.

name: Venore Salamander Cave
strategy:
Good hunt for free accounts to make a great profit on low level characters. There are 4 types of creatures, so it's also a good place to do bestiary.

‚Ä¢ The creatures are very weak, so a brass/plate set is enough.

üí∞ **Valuable Loot**
‚Ä¢ Marsh Stalker and Swampling drop valuable loots, used in quests and imbuements: Marsh Stalker Feather, Marsh Stalker Beak (expensive during bewitched) and Piece of swampling wood.

name: Fenrock
strategy:
Good profit hunt for knights level 13+. The profit will depend upon the price of tortoise shell in your server.

üêä **Task**
‚Ä¢ You can make crocodile's task to kill 300 of them for a chance to kill the boss The Snapper.

‚öîÔ∏è **Strategy**
‚Ä¢ Kill the creatures as fast as you can and rotate in a loop. You unlock the bestiaries of tortoises and crocodiles killing 500 of each (30 charm points in total).

name: Venore Amazon Camp
strategy:
Great spawn for low level paladins to make a nice profit.

üí∞ **Items**
‚Ä¢ The Amazons drop Protective Charm, which can be sold for 8k+, depending on your server.

üèπ **Strategy**
‚Ä¢ Bring spears and, if you are able, kill some Valkyries in the tower from time to time to get more spears.

name: East Larva Cave
strategy:
Just hit larvas and scarabs with a melee weapon ‚öîÔ∏è. If you have a fire weapon üî• it's good, because larvas and scarabs are weak to fire.

‚Ä¢ From skills 60/60+ you can try the second floor.

name: Cemetery Quarter
strategy:
Good place to rush low level paladins in a place that is always available.

‚Ä¢ The creatures walk slowly, so just keep distance and attack them with spears.

‚Ä¢ Explore the whole cave, collecting gold and creature items. The profit is small though.

name: Rookgaard Premium Wolves
strategy:
Wolves are so nice to hunt because they drop meat all the time! This way, you almost don't need to use Small Health Potions.

üèÜ This is the best premium account hunt and the 2nd best hunt in Rookgaard, only losing for Mino Hell, which is usually full because it's free account and mino's drops are more valuable.

name: Port Hope Swamp Trolls
strategy:
Great hunt for paladins level 8+ to get a big profit. The experience is low but you will get levels fast anyways because of the Low Level XP Bonus.

‚Ä¢ Close to the depot, easy to deposit gold and refill.

üí∞ **Items**
‚Ä¢ You will loot many Medicine Pouchs that can be sold for 3-7k, depending on your server.

üèπ **Strategy**
‚Ä¢ Bring just a few Spears because Swamp Trolls drop it, so you won't have problems if they break.

name: Venore Swamp Troll Cave
strategy:
Technique basically consists of attacking the swamp trolls and being careful with the amount of slugs you have around because they are strong depending on the character's level.

‚Ä¢ There's a chance to get the mount item Slug Drug.

name: Tiquanda Crustacean Caves
strategy:
Great place for crocodile task.

‚Ä¢ At lower levels hunt only at first floor, there are Tortoises on lower floors and if you don't have high skill or a little more level you can't kill it.

name: Nomad Cave
strategy:
One of the best places to profit on low level üí∞. You will loot rope belts, an item to make imbuements that's very demanded in the market.

‚Ä¢ Just lure a few nomads and attack with your weapon.

requirements.name: Must have started Arito's Task Quest

name: Minotaur Hell
strategy:
This is ONLY for high level Rookers because you need to run fast to keep high xp/hour.

‚Ä¢ The route is basically Mino Hell > Spiders Cave > Mino Hell.

name: Ancient Temple Rotworms
strategy:
Try to always be attacking some creature. Walk through the cave luring and killing the rotworms with your wand/rod.

‚Ä¢ Heal with exura/exura infir.

‚Ä¢ If you have money, it's very important to buy a pair of Boots of Haste. It will improve a lot your experience.

name: Minotaur Hell
strategy:
The best free account hunt in Rookgaard! Minotaurs drop Mino Leathers, the best item for Rookers, also you can find the boss Apprentice Sheng that drops nice items.

‚Ä¢ Wolves and Orcs will help you dropping food, so you just need to carry Small Health Potions. üòÑ

‚Ä¢ The route is Mino Hell >> Bear Room Area >> Mino Hell. Frequently you will see people hunting there or even training skills.

name: Venore Rotworm Cave
strategy:
Good hunt for free account low level knights (the place is good for every vocation actually).

‚Ä¢ Just heal with exura infir ico and eat food constantly (which you pick from rotworms), there won't be much danger.

‚Ä¢ Bring a few health and mana potions, just for caution. Don't let your mana go full and use spells to train your magic level.

name: Dawnport Goblins
strategy:
Hunt to leave Dawnport in 8-10 minutes.

‚Ä¢ Keep a distance from goblins and attack them with your wand, attack spells and runes.

‚Ä¢ Don't forget you need to have a Shovel and a Rope to hunt here.

‚Ä¢ It is NOT necessary to get the loots if you just want to rush to Mainland. üëå

name: Kilmaresh Catacombs
strategy:
Best to use protection against Physical, Holy and Energy damage. Imbue as best you can against these element.

‚Ä¢ For dealing damage it is best to use a weapon with death element, second best option is to use a weapon with ice element.

‚Ä¢ Lure as much monsters as possible while keeping the Druid protected and secured. Communication is key at this spawn!

requirements.name: Mission "Fafnar's Wrath" of Kilmaresh Quest done

name: Kilmaresh Catacombs (Sealed Doors)
strategy:
Great experience and decent profit for duos (EK + ED) level 350+. You must have completed the mission "Fafnar's Wrath" of Kilmaresh Quest to access the sealed doors.

‚Ä¢ Elite Knight always needs to make ED safe (trapped with magic wall and wild growth).

‚Ä¢ Indispensable to use Death attack weapon (Mortal Mace, Soulcutter or Soulbiter).

‚Ä¢ Imbuements: 2 Holy (Armor/Shield), 2 Life (Armor/Weapon), 2 Mana (Helmet/Weapon), 1 Strike (Weapon).

‚Ä¢ Use Prismatic Ring when closing the box, Red Plasma when calm.

‚Ä¢ Use Great HP to help in sio/luring (cheap). Ultimate/Supreme HP for emergencies.

requirements.name: To access the sealed doors, must complete mission "Fafnar's Wrath" of Kilmaresh Quest

name: Kilmaresh Puzzle
strategy:
Best to use protection against Physical, Fire, Energy and Death damage. Imbue as best you can against these element. As for dealing damage it is best to use a weapon with Ice element, second best option is to use a weapon with Earth element.

‚Ä¢ Do not lure much monsters as you start, get to know the place and monsters spawn point. Once you have done a few laps and got a feeling for the spawn, try to lure more and more monsters as you level up.

‚Ä¢ Important to note is that it is vital that the Knight place Magic walls in every pull to keep the Druid protected and secured. Communication is key at this spawn!

requirements.name: Mission "The Revenge of the Ogres" of Kilmaresh Quest done

name: Ancient Ancestorial Grounds
strategy:
Good experience and very good profit for duos level 350+ (EK + ED).

‚Ä¢ Lure the creatures, make a box in each spot and the druid attack with earth spells. The druid must bring poison bombs to not get attacked by monsters out of the box.

‚Ä¢ Prismatic Ring, Prismatic Necklace and Gil Necklace for lower lvls will help with full box or overlures.

‚Ä¢ Dodge on scout can help you survive there.

requirements.name: Mission "Liquid Death" of The Secret Library Quest done

name: Court of Winter
strategy:
Best way to hunt here is making circles shooting GFBs and the Paladin can box when mobs are low health.

‚Ä¢ Prismatic and energy rings are to use when the Paladin gets boxed with Thanatursus and Arachnophobicas.

‚Ä¢ Sorcerer must have UHs ready to heal Paladin and combo with Magic Shield (Utamo Vita) to avoid Healing group cooldown.

name: Haunted Temple
strategy:
Very good hunt for DRUID + KNIGHT or PALADIN.

‚Ä¢ As gazers only attack who they see first, it's not necessary to use "exeta res", which is a good hunt for paladins to block (the only problem is hitting the creatures, as they take very little physical damage).

‚Ä¢ EKs with winterblade do some damage!

‚Ä¢ Always Imbued and with fire protection if possible.

requirements.name: Started mission "Haunted House" of The Dream Courts Quest

name: Haunted Temple
strategy:
Very good hunt for DRUID + KNIGHT or PALADIN.

‚Ä¢ As gazers only attack who they see first, it's not necessary to use "exeta res", which is a good hunt for paladins to block (the only problem is hitting the creatures, as they take very little physical damage).

‚Ä¢ EKs with winterblade do some damage!

‚Ä¢ Always Imbued and with fire protection if possible.

requirements.name: Started mission "Haunted House" of The Dream Courts Quest

name: Roshamuul Prison
strategy:
Great hunt for teams level 200+ to get experience and a decent loot.

‚Ä¢ On the first lap enter the room by your right, always throw energy bomb mages' foot and poison bomb in knight's foot.
